remarks: Multiplication of a vector by a negated scalar.  ( ~ lmodvsneg analog.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
clmvsneg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
clmvsneg.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
clmvsneg.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
clmvsneg.n $e |- N = ( invg ` W ) $.
clmvsneg.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
clmvsneg.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. CMod ) $.
clmvsneg.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
clmvsneg.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. K ) $.
clmvsneg $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` ( R .x. X ) ) = ( -u R .x. X ) ) $.
